subject: Boxing
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Bennie Heard, who spent 20 years in prison, is doing something that few fighters, if any, have done: resuscitating his career at the astonishing age of 48.
snippet: Bennie Heard, who spent 20 years in prison, is doing something that few fighters, if any, have done: resuscitating his career at the astonishing age of 48.
